page.title: 16Farming
page.content: The land around Wolvey is mainly devoted to{FARMING.} Most of the land is used either for growing{CROPS} or for growing grass which is cut for silage or hay. The crops grown are mainly cereals such as wheat and barley. Smaller quantities of oil seed rape, kale, turnips and peas are grown by some farmers. On the farms today everything is highly{MECHANISED.}Tractors, ploughs, hay-making machinery, combines, fertilizer spinners and forklift trucks are now common place. This means that few people are employed full time on the farms. Usually two or three people can run quite a large farm. {LIVESTOCK }kept on the farms around this area consist mainly of milking herds, sheep and pigs.
